mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_review (product_id, user_id, score, content, create_time) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userId}, #{score}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE product_review SET score = #{score}, content = #{content}, create_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, u.real_name AS user_name FROM product_review r LEFT JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY r.create_time DESC
SELECT r.*, p.title AS product_title FROM product_review r LEFT JOIN product p ON r.product_id = p.id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.create_time DESC
